p: In primary human monocytes, alpha-1 adrenoceptor stimulation by phenylephrine has been reported to suppress the NLPR3 inflammasome [ 87]; however, the same drug has been reported to induce cardiac dysfunction and inflammation in vivo as evidenced by increased expression of IL-6 and NLRP3 [ 195]. Across a variety of stressful situations, increases in EPI levels are associated with elevations of the proinflammatory cytokine IL-6 [ 41, 84, 90, 96, 100, 135, 141]; however, bases for this relationship have not been systemically studied.
